Chirp.title: Chirp
Chirp.content:
.page-title { 
			font-size: 1.70rem; 
		}
	 
 
Chirp is an elegant, ultra-minimalist AI chat overlay built for seamless interaction with local LLMs like LLaMA 3 via Ollama. It launches as a transparent, always-on-top chat bar that auto-hides when not in use and instantly reappears when your cursor approaches the bottom of your screen. Messages can be sent without waiting for previous responses to complete, too!
No visible UI clutter. No toggles. Just you, your thoughts, and an AI ready to talk.
Whether you’re working, coding, writing, or just thinking, Chirp makes accessing powerful language models effortless and invisible — until you need them. Optimized for distraction-free environments and a touch of futuristic magic ✨.
Download the repository and run the main.exe file to use. No messy installations.
Note:

You must have ollama installed
You must have llama3 installed through ollama. To get llama3 with Ollama, use:

ollama pull llama3
